user.title: Configure Incoming Webhook
user.description: Set up the Incoming Webhook integration. You'll need to configure a JWT secret for authentication and define your webhook switches.

data_description.jwt_secret: Secret key for JWT token validation. Must be at least 32 characters long.
data_description.port: Port for the webhook server (1024-65535). Default: 8099
data_description.switches: JSON array of switch configurations. Each switch needs an id, name, and optionally an icon.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Incoming Webhook
reconfigure.description: Update your Incoming Webhook configuration. You can change the JWT secret, port, or modify your switches.

error.invalid_jwt_secret: JWT Secret must be at least 32 characters long
error.invalid_switch_id: Switch ID can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
error.invalid_switches_format: Invalid switches format. Expected JSON array with id, name, and optional icon
error.empty_switches: At least one switch must be configured
